name: Rakennuspartio.fi
description: Construction company website with service listings and contact forms.
longDescription: Built a professional WordPress website for Rakennuspartio, a Finnish construction company. The site features service descriptions, project galleries, and contact functionality to help the company establish an online presence and attract clients.

name: Kromatografiaseura.fi
longDescription: Developed the website for Kromatografiaseura (Finnish Chromatography Society), an academic organization. The site provides information about the society, upcoming events, and membership details for researchers and professionals in the chromatography field.

name: Huoltoauto.com
description: Automotive maintenance and repair service website.
longDescription: Built a website for Huoltoauto, an automotive maintenance and repair service in Finland. The site showcases their services, pricing, and allows customers to get in touch for vehicle maintenance needs.

name: Wossikka.fi
longDescription: Developed Wossikka.fi, a Finnish lifestyle and culture website. The site features articles, event listings, and community content for its audience.

name: Jalotofu
description: WordPress site and Facebook campaign for a Finnish tofu brand.
longDescription: Created the web presence for Jalotofu, a Finnish tofu and plant-based food brand. Work included the WordPress website with product information and recipes, and a Facebook campaign or app to promote the brand on social media.

name: Reissumies
description: WordPress site and Facebook app for a Finnish travel and adventure blog.
longDescription: Built the online presence for Reissumies, a Finnish travel and adventure content brand. Work included the WordPress site with travel stories and destination guides, as well as a viral Facebook app that let users generate their own personalised bread-package name — turning "Reissumies" into alternatives like Palomies, Merimies, or Leipähenkilö.
achievements: Custom blog layout with rich media support

name: Puolenkuun Pelit
description: Board game and tabletop gaming store website.
longDescription: Developed the website for Puolenkuun Pelit, a Finnish board game and tabletop gaming store. The site features their product catalog, event information for gaming nights, and serves as an online presence for one of Finland's well-known gaming shops.

name: Liveblast Festival 2017
description: Music festival website with artist lineup and event details.
longDescription: Built the website for Liveblast Festival 2017, a Finnish music festival. Features included artist lineup presentation, ticket sales integration, event schedule, and venue information to drive festival attendance and provide visitor information.
achievements: Artist lineup with bios and photos

name: Lähipalvelut.com
description: Local services marketplace connecting service providers with customers.
longDescription: Developed Lähipalvelut.com, a local services marketplace platform in Finland. The platform connects local service providers with customers, featuring service listings, provider profiles, booking capabilities, and a review system to facilitate local commerce.

name: Construction Worker Hiring Platform
description: Platform for hiring construction workers and managing job postings.
longDescription: Built a specialized hiring platform for the construction industry. The platform enables construction companies to post job openings, review worker profiles, and manage the hiring process. Workers can create profiles, showcase their skills, and apply for positions.

name: Cabin Rental Business
description: Cabin rental booking platform with availability management.
longDescription: Developed a cabin rental business platform for managing property listings, availability calendars, and customer bookings. The system includes an admin panel for property owners and a customer-facing booking experience.

name: FormFiller
description: Bookmarklet-based LinkedIn Easy Apply auto-filler with AI-powered CV import.
longDescription: A React app that generates a bookmarklet to auto-fill LinkedIn Easy Apply forms. Stores your full job application profile (personal info, experience, education, skills) in the browser. Optionally imports your CV via the Anthropic API to populate your profile automatically. No server required — everything runs locally.
achievements: Bookmarklet auto-fills LinkedIn Easy Apply forms
AI CV import via Anthropic API
All data stored locally in browser

name: JobFinder
description: Job search aggregation tool that finds and organizes job listings.
longDescription: Developed a job search tool that aggregates listings from multiple sources, helping users find relevant positions more efficiently. Features include search filtering, saved searches, and organized job listing management.

name: Python Pong
description: Classic Pong game built with Python, Flask, HTML/CSS and Docker.
longDescription: A recreation of the classic Pong arcade game built with Python and Flask, featuring an HTML/CSS frontend. The project includes Docker support for easy deployment and demonstrates game development concepts with a web-based approach.

name: LinkedIn Tool
description: Personal job-seeking assistant that compares your CV against your LinkedIn profile.
longDescription: A personal job-seeking assistant that parses CV data and compares it against a LinkedIn profile to identify gaps, inconsistencies, and opportunities. Uses environment-based secret management with KeePassXC.

name: Web Scraper
description: Recursively downloads files from websites by type, with a TUI and CLI interface.
longDescription: A Python tool for bulk downloading files from websites by file type pattern (e.g. *.pdf, *.mp3). Features both a CLI and a full TUI built with urwid, with a Catppuccin color theme, real-time progress, and directory structure preservation.
achievements: Full TUI with live progress display
